channel.title: Hello, i have added stuff to my cache, this shows up
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-8" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:890) at client.method6(client.java:8428) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:52) at client.run(client.java:5369) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
can someone help me with this problem?

item.title: Hello, i have added stuff to my cache, this shows up
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

What Zyle says.
You need to allow the client to use more memory.

Read full topic

item.source: Hello, i have added stuff to my cache, this shows up

item.title: Hello, i have added stuff to my cache, this shows up
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The cache is now too large, if your using a 317 cache (meaning, like 6-9mb cache) then you will need to disable crc check. If it has PC and Jad stuff that means its a 377 cache. But that will mean that you have too large of a cache.

Read full topic
item.source: Hello, i have added stuff to my cache, this shows up
